review: Love it, large variety of movies, etc.  Have recommended to friends and family.
author: Staci Novak

review: This has helped me enjoy many shows I can't see on my satellite programming
author: vic

review: All you could want and more. We actually use it in the kitchen so my wife can watch when she is in there doing her thing. Very happy
author: Gregory Cicchetti

review: Easy to install, and will save us lots! Now that we have this, we can cut our cable bill tremendously!  Easy access to Netflix and Amazon Prime content. Love the Amazon Music playlists I set up.  It has made our TV more functional.  We are still trying out all the different apps.
author: Amazon Customer

review: perfect for low cost television viewing...and movies galore.
author: otway9811
